database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - Colibactin pathway-dependent metabolites
entry.description: Ethyl acetate extracts of clb+ and clbP mutant from E. coli IHE0334 clb genomic island. Files with WT = clb+ wild-type; Files labeled as "P" denotes clbP mutant. Both a peptide and unbiased isotope model was used for acquisition of MS/MS data.
